descriptions.description: The JasPer Project is an open-source initiative to provide a free software-based reference implementation of the codec specified in the JPEG-2000 Part-1 standard (i.e., ISO/IEC 15444-1).

set.commands: oegenv 32 oegcleanbase oegextract jasper-1.900.1.zip # --with-x use the X Window System # --with-glut-include-dir=DIR Set GLUT include directory. # --with-glut-lib-dir=DIR Set GLUT library directory. configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-gnu-ld --without-x make make install DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} cd ${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}/${OEG_BASE_DIR} oegarchive jasper-1.900.1
